boat.name: Halewyn
boat.full_description:
Halewyn is a bermudan rigged centreboarder, her hull mahogany and her deck and cockpit teak. She has 4 berths and comes with VHF and other crusing equipment as well as a suit of sails.

She has been in the current ownership since 1991. She underwent a 3 year rebuild at that time and was relaunched in 1994. She's been a much-loved family cruising boat since then, participating in gaffer rallies in the north of France, but sadly ill health and now the sad passing of one owner means she must be sold.

She's currently in a yard in Calais but soon to be returned to her home port of Dunkerque.
boat.construction_details: Hull mahogany, mast spruce, Deck and cockpit teak
boat.short_description: 'Haleywn' is a Bermudan sloop, with mahogany hull, built 1960 at St Malo by Labbe.
